Name: 吾王的荣耀 Honor of Knight King
About the game: summary This is a third person RPG action game. Players will play the knight king and fight with the wizard army in the arena. Players will acquire various skills in the process of fighting. In the dark darkness, a torch suddenly lit up, illuminating an ancient arena in the forest. The sleeping hero slowly opened her eyes. She seemed to feel that an evil force was coming. It was the breath of the Dark Wizard. The dark Legion was coming again. Could Yingxiong still remove the darkness and become stronger in the battle, Break through the heavy siege of the army and live until you kill the Dark Wizard and calm the night. Game features ]Block counterattack: the moment the enemy attacks, you can right-click to release the skill to counterattack. If the counterattack is successful, the enemy will interrupt the attack action and enter a short pause state. Gorgeous skill: every time you destroy an enemy, you have a chance to drop a treasure chest. Close to opening the treasure chest, you will randomly obtain blood return, blue return or skills. You must get a skill for each boss you destroy. Quick killing: the hero's skills are range attacks. All skills can fly the enemy. Different skill ranges and release methods are different. Releasing corresponding skills according to the enemy's range and scale is the best choice in war.
